title: Question:
author: Kimsha
content: One feature interest me the most,D-payment:  WireMin users can connect their Bitcoin or Ethereum wallet with their account on WireMin. You can transfer cryptos to your contacts on WireMin. They support multiple wallets, making transactions between close friends much easier. Everything can be completed within one app, the talking, the copying wallet address, the notification, etc.

comments.author: RienS
comments.body: Their statement confused me. Inspired by Bitcoin but not based on Bitcoin? What does that even mean? http://wiremin.org/#/FAQ

comments.author: Kimsha
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on October 11, 2023, 08:53:39 AMIf you're here to announce WireMin, it'd be appreciated if you give additional information (or at least link to WireMin) to attract more people. Anyway, i just have 1 question for now. How well WireMin compared with non-centralized social media/messanger such as Matrix, XMPP or other option which can be categorized as Fediverse (such as Mastodon and Lemmy)?I am not here to promote WireMin, which is why I haven't provided any links. If people are interested, they can search for it on their own.  As for your question, I believe its strength lies in its resistance to censorship. While off-topic posts can result in bans on platforms like Mastodon and Lemmy, it appears this won't happen on WireMin according to their FAQ. Additionally, users can remain fully anonymous; no email or phone number is required when creating accounts.
